adDetails: I tutor Math, Statistics, Economics, Finance, Accounting, Physics and can be generally helpful with anything which in some way involves numbers or logic. I did my undergraduate studies in Mathematics and graduate work in Economics. I worked with undergraduate, graduate and MBA students at top universities. I can help with the following subjects: (*) Probability, Statistics and Econometrics for all MAJORS, graduate and MBA students (*) Data analysis consulting (Stata, SPSS, SAS, Minitab, Excel, R, Gams, Gauss, Gretl ..) (*) Basic Math, Pre-Algebra, Algebra, Calculus, Geometry and Trigonometry (*) Linear programming and Optimization Methods (*) Microeconomics and Macroeconomics (*) International Economics and Labor Economics (*) Game Theory (*) Linear Algebra (*) Standardized Tests: Series 6 and 7, GRE, GMAT, LSAT, PSAT, SAT, Regent, ACT, GED, MTEL and CFA tests (*) Series 65 Exam - Registered Investment Advisor (*) Discrete Math (*) Finance (Corporate and Managerial) (*) Accounting (*) Business plan / Case study (*) Decision Analysis (*) Operations Research / Operation Management (*) Physics (*) Chess (*) Philosophy (*) History I also tutor online. (Phoenix, Aplia, MathXL, Blackboard) Courses I helped in the past used books by Mankiw, Romer, Krugman, Bodie, Marcus, Kieso, Hillier, Wooldridge, Warner, Ross, Atkinson, Tannenbaum, Binmore, Duflo, Gujarati, Hansen, Frank, Bernanke, Horngren, Keller, Doane, Borjas etc .. I can also help with online course, homework or assignment.
